block.p: Margot Kristin Danzig, the daughter of Dolores C. Danzig and Douglas J. Danzig of New York, was married yesterday to Joseph Harry Medved, the son of Margaret and Joseph J. Medved of Manchester, N.H. The Rev. Paul L. Gregoire, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. Peter the Apostle Church in Amagansett, N.Y.
Mr. and Mrs. Medved, both 25, graduated from Boston College, where they met.

Margot Danzig, Joseph Medved Margot Kristin Danzig, the daughter of Dolores C. Danzig and Douglas J. Danzig of New York, was married yesterday to Joseph Harry Medved, the son of Margaret and Joseph J. Medved ofManchester, N.H. The Rev. Paul L. Gregoire, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. Peter the Apostle Church in Amagansett, N.Y.

Margot Kristin Danzig, the daughter of Dolores C. Danzig and Douglas J. Danzig of New York, was married yesterday to Joseph Harry Medved, the son of Margaret and Joseph J. Medved of Manchester, N.H. The Rev. Paul L. Gregoire, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. Peter the Apostle Church in Amagansett, N.Y.
Mr. and Mrs. Medved, both 25, graduated from Boston College, where they met.

The bride is a marketing coordinator for personnel recruitment at Merrill Lynch & Company in New York. Her father is a partner, in New York, of Fulbright & Jaworski, the Houston law firm, and is the chairman of the firm's real estate department.

The bridegroom is an associate at J. P. Morgan Chase in New York, where he is working in the telecommunications, media and technology group of the investment banking unit. His mother is a mathematics teacher at Pinkerton Academy, a private high school in Derry, N.H. His father retired as the executive director of the Nashua, N.H., chapter of the American Red Cross. He is now a credit counselor in New Hampshire, working from offices in Manchester, Portsmouth and Rochester, for Consumer Credit Counseling of Maine.
